price: 5. Ya solo, babangi (Allah) bakomelaka na bakopo ya kitoko ya kafura ya malili solo kitoko.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلۡأَبۡرَارَ يَشۡرَبُونَ مِن كَأۡسٖ كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا كَافُورًا

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: inna al-abrāra yashrabūna min kasin kāna mizājuhā kāfūran
